channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
Every time i click on my spell book with lunars it lags me out of my client and gives me this
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:8446) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8331) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1892) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8148) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8896) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4685) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) please help

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @austin_2011 austin_2011
item.description:
@austin_2011 wrote:

Every time i click on my spell book with lunars it lags me out of my client and gives me this

Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.drawInterface(client.java:8446)
at client.drawInterface(client.java:8331)
at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1892)
at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8148)
at client.processDrawing(client.java:8896)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
at client.run(client.java:4685)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
please help
